content: dots & waves scarf elv needleworks dots & waves scarf what you will need ● size i 5 5mm crochet hook ● 180 yards worsted or aran weight cream yarn ● 180 yards worsted or aran weight gold yarn when choosing your yarn both aran and worsted will work with this pattern and hook however make sure the two colors you have picked are the same yarn weight terms you should know chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet scinc - single_crochet increase half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet skip - skip double_crochet - double_crochet scdec single_crochet decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch all terms are us terms page 2 elv needleworks ©2024 dots & waves scarf pattern in cream ch12+1 row 1 starting in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet across ch2 turn row 2 *double_crochet 5 times ch2sk2 double_crochet 5 times repeat from * across ch1 turn row 3 single_crochet across tie off turn in gold row 4 join with slip_stitch to first st from previous row ch1 half_double_crochet across ch1 turn row 5 *single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet repeat from * across tie off turn starting with cream alternate colors every row row 6-9 *decsc scinc scinc decsc repeat from * across tie off turn in gold row 10 join with slip_stitch to first st from previous row ch2 *double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet repeat from * across ch1 turn row 11 half_double_crochet across tie off turn in cream row 12 single_crochet across ch2 turn row 13 repeat row 2 row 14 repeat row 3 you have now completed the body of your scarf tip repeat row 6-9 more times for a wider scarf page 3 elv needleworks ©2024 dots & waves scarf tassels add tassels to both ends of every stripe i like to wrap a piece of yarn around my hand five times for each tassel page 4 elv needleworks ©2024 dots & waves scarf thank you for downloading dots & waves scarf check out the video tutorial for this scarf at https //youtu be/fgstflsaqtc if you have any questions or need some help don t hesitate to emailelvneedleworks@gmail comor join our discord server at https //discordapp com/invite/wxngnhd page 5 elv needleworks ©2024
